natlang.rdg.model
Class RSDepTreeNode

java.lang.Object
  parlevink.parlegraph.model.MComponentAdapter
      parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertexAdapter
          parlevink.parlegraph.model.MLabeledVertex
              natlang.rdg.model.RSDepTreeNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
parlevink.parlegraph.model.MComponent, parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertex, parlevink.parlegraph.view.TextInterface, parlevink.xml.XMLizable
public class RSDepTreeNode
extends parlevink.parlegraph.model.MLabeledVertex

This class represents a node in a dependency tree of the type used in a rhetorical dependency graph (based on the dependency trees used by Alpino). It inherits the usual treenode-functionality from natlang.deptree.TreeNode, such as a mother, daughters, a label. The data are contained in a RTreeNodeData.
